SEARCH
Package ProjectApplication

Class ProjectApplication

java.lang.Object
ProjectApplication.ProjectApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity
public class ProjectApplication extends Object implements IEntity
Represents an application submitted by an applicant for a BTO project. Includes details such as the project, applicant, room type, current and previous status, and booking date. Implements the IEntity interface to support CSV serialization and deserialization.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectApplication

      public ProjectApplication(String appID, String projectID, String roomType, String applicantID, ApplicationStatus status, ApplicationStatus applicationStatus, LocalDate book_date)
      Constructs a ProjectApplication with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      appID - the unique ID of the application
      projectID - the ID of the project applied for
      roomType - the type of room applied for
      applicantID - the NRIC or ID of the applicant
      status - the current application status
      applicationStatus - the previous application status
      book_date - the booking date, if applicable
